doc.field: Eksportfinans A/S of Norway is issuing 15 billion yen in eurobonds due April 23, 1992 priced at 103 with a five pct coupon, Mitsubishi Finance International Ltd said as lead manager. Fees are 1-1/4 pct for selling and 5/8 pct for management and underwriting. Payment date is April 23. Listing will be in London and the bonds will be sold in denominations of one mln yen. REUTER
